alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 7:31PM CDT until August 25 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yocemento, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ellis around 735 PM CDT. Yocemento around 740 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm, producing large hail driven by severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.
